text: Hello.
Hi
Have you heard of Save the Children?
Yes I have
Good. It's a very strong and important organization. The lack of child support in developing countries, such as in Syria, has been growing for years now.
Does this organization help people in the USA?
No, they assist children in war zones. In Syria, in 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reported to be killed of injured due to rising violence.
How much of the proceeds go directly towards the children?

For every dollar donated, they receive 77 cents. It's a higher rate than most charities, because while we want most of the money to go to the children, there also needs to be some paid employees, although most are volunteers. Would you be interested in saving a child's life today?
No, thank you.
Are you sure? How many dollars do you spend everyday on pointless or unnecessary items, such as a candy bar or fast food?
I'm sure. I work hard for money so I spend it the way I want.
These children have no way of earning money, as their countries are in shambles. Many die of hunger or preventable disease, up 5.6 million per year. Even 50 cents makes all the difference.
I'm not interested in this charity.
Are you from the US?
Yes I am
Are you aware of the US bombing civilian cities in developing countries? Killing innocent children for no reason at all?
Yes I am but I am not interested in this charity.

It also helps children in Europe. France, Germany, Sweden. The refugee crisis has caused many children in such countries to be without basic necessities. Even the children who were originally from Europe.
It's a terrible situation however I only donate to American charities.
